resources.string: This app is blocked in Focus Mode
Why do you want to open this app?
Enable "Uninstall other apps" access so %1$s can remove apps.
Keeps the focus session overlay visible when time runs out.
Change how this app is displayed in TALauncher.
Pick a name that feels right. This only changes how the app appears inside TALauncher.
You can reset the name anytime from this menu.
To gently guide you away from %1$s when time is up, allow TALauncher to display over other apps in system settings.

string-array.name: motivational_quotes
string-array.item: Every tap is a choiceâ€”make it count.
Stay focused on what truly matters right now.
Small mindful actions create lasting change.
Progress is made one focused moment at a time.
Your attention is your most valuable resource.
Choose intention over impulse.
The best time to focus is now.
Quality over quantity in everything you do.
Mindful usage leads to meaningful outcomes.
Every pause is an opportunity to refocus.
Your future self will thank you for this choice.
Deep work creates lasting impact.
Distraction is the enemy of excellence.
Focus on one thing, do it well.
Time spent mindfully is time well invested.
Choose growth over instant gratification.
Your goals deserve your full attention.
Small consistent actions build great habits.
Be present in this moment.
Clarity comes from focused thinking.
Every moment of focus is a victory.
Discipline in small things leads to big results.
Your productivity reflects your priorities.
Stay committed to your vision.
Focused effort beats scattered energy.
The path to mastery requires sustained attention.
Choose purpose over pleasure.
Your dreams need your dedicated focus.
Excellence requires eliminating the non-essential.
Make this session count toward your bigger goals.
Mindful breaks lead to better performance.
Your concentration is a skill worth developing.
Success comes to those who stay focused longest.
